00001 #include <iostream>
00002 #include <sstream>
00003 using namespace std;
00004 
00005 #ifndef 
00006 #define OTL_ODBC_UNIX
00007 #include <otlv4.h>
00008 
00009 int main(){
00010     int unf;
00011     otl_long_string test;
00012     otl_connect db; // connect object
00013     otl_connect::otl_initialize(); // init ODBC
00014     db.rlogon("UID=REPLACE;PWD=REPLACE;DSN=REPLACE"); // connect to ODBC
00015     otl_stream dbStream(50, "SELECT INV_SKU_Number, INV_Item_Description "
00016                         "FROM Inventory_Table WHERE INV_SKU_Number = '10000'",
00017             db);
00018     while (!dbStream.eof()){
00019     dbStream >> unf >> test;
00020     cout << test.v << " " << unf << endl;
00021     }
00022     db.logoff();
00023     return 0;
00024 }
